channel.title: For a Child
channel.description: Recent content on For a Child

item.title: Christmas 2023, gifts for orphans
item.description: The beginning is always difficult. As much as it is difficult, however, it is exciting and adventurous. Right? You never know what you can do until you try it.

item.title: Time Travel: Can you know, at least in part, how the humanity will look like?
item.description: In the realm of this world everyone is looking for hapiness, that comes from fullfiling relationships; not the least of all are children who are very specifically focused on learning and developing relationships.

item.title: About
item.description: For a Child is your gateway to the impact and change that you can do. We are a passionate community of volunteers, and stargazers dedicated to improve the lives of the young generation in Republic of Moldova.
